```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

library(highcharter)
hcoptslang <- getOption("highcharter.lang")
hcoptslang$numericSymbols <-c( "k", "M", "B" ,"T", "P" ,"E")
options(highcharter.lang = hcoptslang)

xaxis <- readRDS("./xaxis.rds") * 1000

t1_coef <- readRDS("./t1_coef.rds")


t1_coef <- cbind(xaxis, t1_coef)
t1_coef <- data.frame(t1_coef)

names(t1_coef) <- c("Total_Assets", "T1_Cap_Coef_All_Banks")

h <- hchart(t1_coef, "line", hcaes(x = "Total_Assets", y = "T1_Cap_Coef_All_Banks")) %>% hc_yAxis(max = 1000) %>% hc_yAxis(min = -1000) %>% hc_add_theme(hc_theme_economist()) %>% hc_title(text = "$250,000 to $1M SB Loans:  All Banks")
h
```
